author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA LIKELY STARTING TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK...
summary: ...MELISSA LIKELY STARTING TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... As of 5:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Melissa was located near 16.6, -75.5 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA LIKELY STARTING TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY AND EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... As of 5:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Melissa was located near 16.6, -75.5 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
